Sentencas: The cathodic polarization behavior of strontium-doped lanthanum manganite (LSM) fired on stabilized zirconia electrolyte was investigated.
Titulo: A comparative study on polarization behavior of (La,Sr)MnO3 and (La,Sr)CoO3 cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The performance of LSM was enhanced significantly during discharge operation.
Titulo: A comparative study on polarization behavior of (La,Sr)MnO3 and (La,Sr)CoO3 cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The subsequent relaxation behavior under open-circuit state proceeded with two steps.
Titulo: A comparative study on polarization behavior of (La,Sr)MnO3 and (La,Sr)CoO3 cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A comparative study was also performed on strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite (LSC) electrodes.
Titulo: A comparative study on polarization behavior of (La,Sr)MnO3 and (La,Sr)CoO3 cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cathode potential of LSC with stabilized zirconia electrolyte decreased significantly at first and then increased gradually under current-static cathodic polarization.
Titulo: A comparative study on polarization behavior of (La,Sr)MnO3 and (La,Sr)CoO3 cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The subsequent relaxation in the open-circuit state also proceeded by two steps.
Titulo: A comparative study on polarization behavior of (La,Sr)MnO3 and (La,Sr)CoO3 cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: When the interlayer of Sm-doped ceria (SDC) was introduced between electrolyte and cathode, the performance enhancement under cathodic polarization became much smaller regardless of the cathode materials, LSM and LSC.
Titulo: A comparative study on polarization behavior of (La,Sr)MnO3 and (La,Sr)CoO3 cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The mechanisms for the polarization behavior of LSM and LSC were discussed based on the obtained results.
Titulo: A comparative study on polarization behavior of (La,Sr)MnO3 and (La,Sr)CoO3 cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells
